name: BirdSpotter
description:
This is my birthday present to you!  It's a pre-alpha, there's no audio yet. Thanks for playing!! <3

Quick tutorial:

You're staying at your uncle's place, he has gone on vacation. You have a backpack where you can store stuff (start) and there's a garden with a box where you can store and use garden decorations. 

Z =A X = B ENTER = START (ALBUM, inventory)

You can download the Gameboy file, you'll need an emulator for GBC or a GB flash cartridge to play it.

Made in GBStudio!
